sentences.en: A joint of the vertical pile with power - wasting gap is brought forward based on tenon - and - mortise work.
sentences.cn: 根据榫卯连接减震耗能的原理提出一种具有耗能缝隙的直桩节点.

sentences.en: And there are any metallic connectives on this bed, joggle is between bed leg and bedplate, craftsman certains ably good mortise, this bed combination is together.
sentences.cn: 并且这个床上没有任何金属连接物，床腿和床板之间都是榫接的，工匠巧妙地凿好榫眼，将这个床组合在一起。

sentences.en: Factory machining can prepare the door to receive cylindrical, tubular, mortise, unit , and rim locks.
sentences.cn: 厂内加工能够方便地在门上安装筒式门锁 、 柱式门锁 、 插销锁 、 单锁和外装门锁.

sentences.en: In addition , mortise holes were made on the full - size timber, and resonant frequencies measured sequently.
sentences.cn: 结果显示, 共振频率随榫槽数之增加仅略为减少.

sentences.en: Mortise and tenon structure can withstand a nail than furniture made of greater tension.
sentences.cn: 卯榫结构可以承受比用钉子做成的家具更大的张力.

sentences.en: The results showed that the resonant frequency decreased slightly with increased number of mortise holes.
sentences.cn: 此一结果将有助于对老旧建材弹性留存率之评估,有助于此等建材之有效再利用.

sentences.en: The tenon does not conform to the mortise , so it can not fit into the mortise.
sentences.cn: 榫头的大小和卯眼不相符, 无法落槽.

sentences.en: To fit into a socket mortise.
sentences.cn: 通过榫和榫眼而连接在一起.

sentences.en: Uses mortise lock that is inserted inside the door for maximum safety.
sentences.cn: 使用插锁,插入到门框里面,最大限度保证安全.

trans.tran_en: a hole cut in a piece of wood or stone so that the shaped end of another piece will fit there firmly
